sentences.en: He dismissed the prime minister’s comments as ‘pure humbug’.
sentences.cn: 他对首相的评论不屑一顾，认为是“纯粹的假道学”。

sentences.en: I am a humbug , and I've been one all my life, without knowing it.
sentences.cn: 我是个骗子,活了一辈子,骗了一辈子, 自己还不知道.

sentences.en: I am going to expose all this humbug.
sentences.cn: 我要揭露这一切骗人的鬼话.

sentences.en: I know my words can seem to him nothing but utter humbug.
sentences.cn: 我知道,我说的话在他看来不过是彻头彻尾的慌言.

sentences.en: I thought you must be a humbug all along, from the conceited way you talked.
sentences.cn: 看你说话的那副神气,我就知道你一定是个吹牛的骗子.

sentences.en: In that way one is sure of accepting no humbug.
Life is all moon shine, a monstrous humbug, a grand suck - in.
sentences.cn: 生活全是假象, 是可怕的欺诈, 是一场吸引人上当的大骗局.

sentences.en: Take the humbug out of this world, and you haven't much left to do business with.
sentences.cn: 把骗子们从这世上轰出去之后, 就没剩几个可以跟你来往做生意的了.

sentences.en: That idea is a load of humbug.
sentences.cn: 那个意见简直是一派胡言.

sentences.en: The humbug was sentenced to three years'imprisonment.
sentences.cn: 那个骗子被判了三年徒刑.

sentences.en: The man who can still humbug himself has before him a future not lacking in brightness.
sentences.cn: 能够蒙骗自己的人仍然具有不乏光明的前景.

sentences.en: There was all the usual humbug and obligatory compliments from ministers.
sentences.cn: 全都是些部长们常说的骗人鬼话和少不了的奉承恭维。

sentences.en: These small messages are considered to be humbug and are laughed at.
sentences.cn: 这些小道消息被当作一派胡言而一笑置之.

sentences.en: This is all humbug and good humor, of course.
sentences.cn: 这些当然只是人们的幽默和子虚乌有.

sentences.en: What a revolting humbug the man was!
sentences.cn: 那人真是个令人作呕的伪君子！

trans.tran_cn: 欺骗，虚伪，骗子，薄荷硬糖
trans.tran_en: insincere or dishonest words or behaviour
